review:
My experience with Dr. Shanthala was wonderful. She is friendly, caring, supportive and very kind. 
She gives plenty of time to explain things very clearly and never rush. She was always been frank in her approach that gave me so much confidence. She made sure that I will have the best possible pregnancy and also most safe experience especially during this covid-19 pandemic time. 

She handled the whole delivery so well and even post pregnancy care was well managed. I would highly recommend this doctor as a must visit doctor for your pregnancy. 

Thank you so much doctor and we have a lovely Prince because of you. I am really thankful and grateful for your service.
reply_text: Thank you Bhargavi for your confidence in me.god bless you all.Be safe

review: Had a comfortable and safe delivery at sagar hospital thanks to entire team of doctors, nurses and supporting staffs. Special and heartfelt thanks to my gynaecologist Dr. Shanthala mam In her hands we really felt safe and secure right from day 1 of our pregnancy. Her expertise gave us full support and strength to completely enjoy being pregnant and now we are celebrating life with our baby girl. Thanks üôè

I would like to thank for my best n smooth pregnancy journey.. As per my wish she delivered baby without C section. **** * **** ****** *** doesn't mind if we take her time in clearing our doubts. She's very transparent and always available over phone.. I had labour pain in the mid night still she came and attended me ontime. Even for my mom she treated well for her uterus surgery.. Me and our family members are very happy from your service..Thanks again for everything.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your trust n confidence in me .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We recently visited doctor for my mother-in-law treatment, she did not even given 3 minutes of her time. She wrote 4 medicine & three test, when we asked what is the problem and why this occured? She did not even replied and her associate said wait for report. ** *** ****** ***** ***** ******* *** ***** ***** ********* ** **** ********* *** ************* no smile on her face, she was shouting and scolding her associate in front of us. We paid 600/- for appointment she did not even spare 3 minutes of her time, seems she was so busy *** **** ***** ** ****** ** **** *** ******** **** * ********** ** ************* *** *** ********* ***** **** **** ***** First time in life we met such a rude doctor, I don't wish to see her in future.It was first time we visited in Sagar Hospital and because of her & the experience we had that became the last time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is a very patient listener, I liked how she carefully clarified any and every doubt that we had ,******* *** ** * **** **** ****** I recommend her
